      • checkLevelBeat

        public void checkLevelBeat(int rounds,
                           int health)
        Check if the current level is beat, and check if lives were lost. If achievement is unlocked, add it to the queue to be displayed
        Parameters:
        rounds - The number of rounds survived
        health - The health of the user

      • checkPath

        public void checkPath(Node[] checkPathToTarget,
                      Start start,
                      int num)
        Checks the path and updates it if the path has changed. Removes the last tower if the path is invalid.
        Parameters:
        checkPathToTarget - The Node array being used to check the path
        start - The starting point of the enemies
        num - The path ball number to replace

        public void editMap(int x,
                    int y,
                    Tower type,
                    int size)
        Edits the 2d array of towers when a tower is placed on the map.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the tower
        y - The y position of the Tower
        type - The tower being added
        size - The size of the tower (towers are 2x2 while walls and obstacles are 1x1)

      • showTowers

        public void showTowers()
        Shows the towers when creating the TowerBar

      • spawnEnemies

        public void spawnEnemies(int health,
                         int spawnInterval)
        Spawns enemies randomly based on the number of health each level can spawn. Stronger enemies such as demons and dragons spawn at set levels and after a set level. Once the round health has been filled with enemy health, enemies stop spawning.
        Parameters:
        health - The total amount of health in the round
        spawnInterval - The number of acts in between enemy spawns

      • startRound

        public void startRound()
        Starts the round by incrementing the round
